maker.description: 오픈소스 에디터인 Xquared를 이용한 위지윅 에디터입니다. 자세한 정보는 Xquared 홈페이지를 참조하세요. http://labs.openmaru.com/projects/xquared Xquared is copyrighted free software by Alan Kang .

This is the editor skin based on the open source WYSIWYG Editor, Xquared. You can find more deatiled information from Xquared's official homepage. http://labs.openmaru.com/projects/xquared/ Xquared is copyrighted free software by Alan Kang .
オープンソースエディターのXquaredを利用したウイジウイグエディターです。 詳しい情報は Xquared サイトを参考してください。 http://labs.openmaru.com/projects/xquared Xquared is copyrighted free software by Alan Kang .
